DOC.criteria: Male Aged 1835 year 18.5 < BMI < 30 kg/m2 Smoking Performing regular resistance training ( 3+ time per week , carry progressive training ) previous 6 month Hypertension ( accord WHO criterion ) and/or cardiovascular disease Any back/leg/knee/neck/postural complaint Use prescribed medication Type 2 diabetes mellitus Any family history thrombosis All comorbidities interact mobility muscle metabolism low limb ( e.g . arthritis , spasticity/rigidity , neurological disorder paralysis ) . Myocardial infarction within last 3 year Use anticoagulant
